properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1 v5 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Mundugaa nirnayinchabadi thanache erparachabadina Thanayulugaanu sweekarinchabadi dhanyulayedaru vaare{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Nirmalamu mari akshayamu viriviga vaada baaranidi Paralokamulo swaastyamu kaligi dhanyulayyedaru vaare{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Kannulaku kanipinchanivi vinpinchanivi chevulakunu Mano gocharamu kaanivi pondi dhanyulayyedaru vaare{/lang-eng}
